title: THEMIS-E:  Solid State Telescope (ESA+SST): Energy Flux spectrogram:  Data includes: Electron/Ion Ground-Calculated Fluxes (ions: 5 eV - 4 MeV,electrons: 6 eV - 700 keV) - V. Angelopoulos, D. Larson & R.P. Lin, C.W. Carlson & J. McFadden (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)

parameters.name: the_eesa_solarwind_flag
parameters.description: ESA-SST electron solar wind mode flag; 0: Not in Solar Wind mode, 1: in Solar Wind mode
